docstring.long_description:
The description of that function is as follows:

    Compute the eigenvalues and right eigenvectors of a square array.
docstring.short_description: The EIG node is based on a numpy or scipy function.

parameters.name: select_return
parameters.description:
Select the desired object to return.
See the respective function docs for descriptors.

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: Matrices for which the eigenvalues and right eigenvectors will be computed.
